db.createCollection("cart");

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "1234567",
"custom_id" : "abcdefg",
"product_name" : "basketball",
"product_description" : "excellent basketball"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "7654321",
"custom_id" : "abcdefg",
"product_name" : "football",
"product_description" : "excellent football"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "1234567",
"custom_id" : "bcdefgh",
"product_name" : "basketball",
"product_description" : "excellent basketball"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "7654321",
"custom_id" : "bcdefgh",
"product_name" : "football",
"product_description" : "excellent football"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "1234567",
"custom_id" : "cdefghi",
"product_name" : "basketball",
"product_description" : "excellent basketball"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "7654321",
"custom_id" : "cdefghi",
"product_name" : "football",
"product_description" : "excellent football"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "1234567",
"custom_id" : "defghij",
"product_name" : "basketball",
"product_description" : "excellent basketball"
});

db.cart.insert({
"product_id": "7654321",
"custom_id" : "defghij",
"product_name" : "football",
"product_description" : "excellent football"
});
